entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
